name: Easter Bunny Dentist Escape - My Cool Virtual Pet Doctor For Kids, Boys And Girls
name_original: Easter Bunny Dentist Escape - My Cool Virtual Pet Doctor For Kids, Boys And Girls
description:
****** Free Easter Bunny Dentist Game! *****

******** Hours of dental delight ***********

Say hello to the newest dentist in town. It’s none other than the awesome Easter Bunny! He’s taking on a new role in this coolest game ever!

Help the Easter Bunny by turning your iPhone/iPad into the dentist’s office and learn about different dental instruments and treatments. Perform a variety of dental procedures and treat the cavities of Bunny’s patients to get their choppers back to being healthy, shiny and pearly white.

Simple, pain-free entertainment at your fingertips! No dental school required!

Features:

* Kid-friendly interface
* Multiple patients with tons of dental problems.
* High quality animations!
* Fun for ALL ages!

Bring back the smile to everyone!

Download FREE Today!
